Carnival expected near to full ships through the year. 
Resuming full operations will likely ramp up operating costs in 2022. The company spent $12.9 billion in operating expenses in 2019, the last full year before the pandemic. But now take into account the cost cutting measures, and Its 2021 operating costs were just $4.6 billion.   
Carnival generated revenue of $14 billion in 2019. It is obvious with Covid diminishing and the CDC restrictions nearly gone that Carnival May soon see it’s all time highs again.
